title: Add colored boxes and species badge to patient card

requirements.summary: Add colored border around notes field and make it always visible
acceptanceCriteria: Notes field has a visible colored border
Notes field is always expanded and visible on the patient card
Notes field is visually distinct from other fields

file_operations.description: Remove collapsible/expandable behavior from notes field and add a colored border (e.g., border-2 border-blue-500) to make the notes field always visible and stand out. Update the rendering logic to display notes directly without the Collapsible wrapper.

requirements.summary: Add purple colored border around Histo task in checklist
acceptanceCriteria: Histo task has a purple border when displayed in the patient card
Purple color is clearly distinguishable from other task colors

file_operations.description: Add conditional styling logic to apply a purple border (e.g., border-2 border-purple-500) around the Histo (histopathology) task item when it is rendered in the checklist section of the patient card.

requirements.summary: Add blue colored border around Imaging task in checklist
acceptanceCriteria: Imaging task has a blue border when displayed in the patient card
Blue color is clearly distinguishable from other task colors

file_operations.description: Add conditional styling logic to apply a blue border (e.g., border-2 border-blue-600) around the Imaging task item when it is rendered in the checklist section of the patient card.

requirements.summary: Add orange colored border around presenting complaint field
acceptanceCriteria: Presenting complaint field has an orange border
Orange color is clearly distinguishable from other field colors

file_operations.description: Add an orange colored border (e.g., border-2 border-orange-500) to the presenting complaint field display section to make it visually distinct from other fields on the patient card.

requirements.summary: Add species badge below medical record number field
acceptanceCriteria: Species is displayed in a rounded badge-style box
Species badge appears directly below the medical record number
Badge has rounded corners and stands out visually

file_operations.description: Add a rounded badge component displaying the species information positioned directly below the medical record number field. Use Tailwind classes like 'rounded-full px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium' with appropriate background color to create a visually distinct badge with rounded corners.
